languages.text: "Как лицемерно. Легко рассуждать о смысле жизни, когда она не твоя собственная. Вы даже представить себе не можете, на что меня пытаетесь обречь. Если вы не хотите мне помогать, то я сама себе помогу".

traits.locale_text: "Как лицемерно. Легко рассуждать о смысле жизни, когда она не твоя собственная. Вы даже представить себе не можете на что меня пытаетесь обречь. Если вы не хотите мне помогать, то я сама себе помогу".

languages.text: "How hypocritical. Easy for you to pontificate about the meaning of life when it's not your own. You have no idea what you're trying to consign me to. If you don't want to help me, then I'll help myself."
languages.original_text: "Как лицемерно. Легко рассуждать о смысле жизни, когда она не твоя собственная. Вы даже представить себе не можете, на что меня пытаетесь обречь. Если вы не хотите мне помогать, то я сама себе помогу".

traits.locale_text: "How hypocritical. Easy for you to pontificate about the meaning of life when it's not your own. You have no idea what you're trying to consign me to. If you don't want to help me, then I'll help myself."

"How hypocritical. Easy for you to pontificate about the meaning of life when it's not your own. You have no idea what you're trying to consign me to. If you don't want to help me, then I'll help myself."

"How hypocritical. Easy for you to pontificate about the meaning of life when it's not your own. You have no idea what you're trying to consign me to. If you don't want to help me, then I'll help myself."

"How hypocritical. Easy for you to pontificate about the meaning of life when it's not your own. You have no idea what you're trying to consign me to. If you don't want to help me, then I'll help myself."

"How hypocritical. Easy for you to pontificate about the meaning of life when it's not your own. You have no idea what you're trying to consign me to. If you don't want to help me, then I'll help myself."

languages.text: “你可真是虚伪。反正要死的人又不是你，你自然可以大谈特谈什么生命的意义。你根本不知道你要把我推向什么结局。既然你不想帮我，那我就自己动手吧。”
languages.original_text: "How hypocritical. Easy for you to pontificate about the meaning of life when it's not your own. You have no idea what you're trying to consign me to. If you don't want to help me, then I'll help myself."

traits.locale_text: “你可真是虚伪。反正要死的人又不是你，你自然可以大谈特谈什么生命的意义。你根本不知道你要把我推向什么结局。既然你不想帮我，那我就自己动手吧。”

languages.text: «Qué hipócrita. Es fácil para usted dar cátedra sobre el significado de la vida cuando no se trata de la suya. No tiene ni idea de a lo que intenta condenarme. Si no quiere ayudarme, me ayudaré a mí misma».
languages.original_text: "How hypocritical. Easy for you to pontificate about the meaning of life when it's not your own. You have no idea what you're trying to consign me to. If you don't want to help me, then I'll help myself."

traits.locale_text: «Qué hipócrita. Es fácil para usted dar cátedra sobre el significado de la vida cuando no se trata de la suya. No tiene ni idea de a lo que intenta condenarme. Si no quiere ayudarme, me ayudaré a mí misma».

languages.text: "Wie heuchlerisch. Ihr könnt leicht vom Sinn des Lebens schwadronieren, wenn es nicht um Euer eigenes geht. Ihr habt keinen Schimmer, was Ihr mir da aufzuerlegen gedenkt. Wenn Ihr mir nicht helfen wollt, dann helfe ich mir eben selbst."
languages.original_text: "How hypocritical. Easy for you to pontificate about the meaning of life when it's not your own. You have no idea what you're trying to consign me to. If you don't want to help me, then I'll help myself."

traits.locale_text: "Wie heuchlerisch. Ihr könnt leicht vom Sinn des Lebens schwadronieren, wenn es nicht um Euer eigenes geht. Ihr habt keinen Schimmer, was Ihr mir da aufzuerlegen gedenkt. Wenn Ihr mir nicht helfen wollt, dann helfe ich mir eben selbst."

languages.text: 「なんて偽善的なの。自分の人生でもないのに、人生の意味について偉そうに言うのは簡単よ。私に何をさせようとしているのか、まったくわかってないみたいね。私を助ける気がないのなら、自分で何とかするわ」
languages.original_text: "How hypocritical. Easy for you to pontificate about the meaning of life when it's not your own. You have no idea what you're trying to consign me to. If you don't want to help me, then I'll help myself."

traits.locale_text: 「なんて偽善的なの。自分の人生でもないのに、人生の意味について偉そうに言うのは簡単よ。私に何をさせようとしているのか、まったくわかってないみたいね。私を助ける気がないのなら、自分で何とかするわ」

languages.text: « Quelle hypocrisie ! C'est facile pour vous de pontifier sur le sens de la vie lorsque ce n'est pas la vôtre qui est en jeu. Vous n'avez pas la moindre idée de ce à quoi vous me condamnez. Si vous ne voulez pas m'aider, je m'aiderai moi-même. »
languages.original_text: "How hypocritical. Easy for you to pontificate about the meaning of life when it's not your own. You have no idea what you're trying to consign me to. If you don't want to help me, then I'll help myself."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle hypocrisie ! C'est facile pour vous de pontifier sur le sens de la vie lorsque ce n'est pas la vôtre qui est en jeu. Vous n'avez pas la moindre idée de ce à quoi vous me condamnez. Si vous ne voulez pas m'aider, je m'aiderai moi-même. »

languages.text: "Ne kadar da riyakârca. Başkalarının hayatının anlamı hakkında konuşurken bilmişlik taslamak kolay tabii. Beni neye emanet etmeye çalıştığın hakkında hiçbir fikrin yok. Bana yardımcı olmak istemiyorsan kendi başımın çaresine bakacağım."
languages.original_text: "How hypocritical. Easy for you to pontificate about the meaning of life when it's not your own. You have no idea what you're trying to consign me to. If you don't want to help me, then I'll help myself."

traits.locale_text: "Ne kadar da riyakârca. Başkalarının hayatının anlamı hakkında konuşurken bilmişlik taslamak kolay tabii. Beni neye emanet etmeye çalıştığın hakkında hiçbir fikrin yok. Bana yardımcı olmak istemiyorsan kendi başımın çaresine bakacağım."
